name: CBK
description:
Made for the 38th GMCJAM, and my first jam game in a long while.

MUSIC ATTRIBUTION:
Windswept by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4629-windswept
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

GAME CONTROLS:
Move with WASD keys (remapping might come soon!)

Break items with Left Clicks
Place with Right Clicks

Throw with SPACE + Left Click(use mouse to aim)

F5 Saves the game!

Recipes for Crafting Altar:
Hammer = 2 Rocks + 2 Wood Blocks
Knife = 2 Rocks + 1 Woods Block
Potion = 4 Slimes
Stone = 4 Rocks

To craft, just throw the items in the mentioned order above to get them in your inventory
